org.pipservices.runtime

Interface IBusinessLogic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IController, IDecorator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBusinessLogic, AbstractController, AbstractDecorator

    public interface IBusinessLogic
extends IComponent
    Interface for components that implement microservice business logic: controllers or decorators.
    Since:
    2016-06-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergey Seroukhov

    • Method Detail

      • getCommands

        List<ICommand> getCommands()
        Get all supported commands
        Returns:
        a list with all commands supported by component.

      • findCommand

        ICommand findCommand(String command)
        Find a specific command by its name.
        Parameters:
        command - the command name.
        Returns:
        a found command or null if nothing was found

      • execute

        Object execute(String command,
               String correlationId,
               DynamicMap args)
        throws MicroserviceError
        Execute command by its name with specified arguments.
        Parameters:
        command - the command name.
        correlationId - a unique correlation/transaction id
        args - a list of command arguments.
        Returns:
        the execution result.
        Throws:
        MicroserviceError - when execution fails for any reason.

      • validate

        List<MicroserviceError> validate(String command,
                                 DynamicMap args)
        Validates command arguments.
        Parameters:
        command - the command name.
        args - a list of command arguments.
        Returns:
        a list of validation errors or empty list when arguments are valid.
